subject: Displaying the results of parameterized JUnit 4 tests in Eclipse

Hi All,

I am developing parameterized JUnit tests in Eclipse.
The paramete=
r sets are stored in a central database.
I execute the tests using the defa=
ult JUnit runner of Eclipse that 
displays something like below in the JUni=
t view (after a test run):

ParamTest [Runner: JUnit 4]
- [0]
   - testMeth=
od[0]
- [1]
   - testMethod[1]

By default only an index is shown in bracke=
ts /[0]/ to identify the 
parameter set.

1.) Do you know any solution to d=
isplay somehow the used parameters 
corresponding to a certain test executi=
on?

For example, it would be nice to see the following picture instead:

P=
aramTest [Runner: JUnit 4]
- [0]
   - testMethod[0](input=3D5, expect=3D25)=

- [1]
   - testMethod[1](input=3D2, expect=3D4)

2.) Is there a way to dis=
play the Standard Output/Error separately 
per each test run?

Please write=
 me if I am asking something that you usually handle with 
a completely dif=
ferent approach.

Best regards,
Tibor
